text: Yalli Qhiyaamah ayr√≥ Nabii Qiisak iyyeh:tah galtoh Ayroy taamoomii kee maxcooca kak Nummatte mara le Numma ken tanfaqu wayta Ayro kinni, usun Jannootay weeqaytitte guba kak gexxa lon umman tet Addal waarak, Yalli usun Addunyal aben meqe taamoomit keenik leedeeh, usun meqe galtoy Yalli Akeeral keenih yeceet kaak leedeenih, too galtoy Yalli keenih yecee kaxxa Maffaafa kinni
